pkgmetadata.longdescription:
## autodynaThis project is a collection of LS-DYNA card writing tools.Developer: @Kevin.Stanton## Usage1. Install with pip
`pip install autodyna`2. Import the library
`import autodyna`3. Run the desired function
`autodyna.[module_name].[function_name]([options])`## Modules* Generalized array data formatting tool (FormatForDYNA.xlsm) - [ReadMe](https://gitlab.arup.com/kevin.stanton/AutomatedCardGenerator_LS-DYNA/blob/master/autodyna/Array_Formatting/ReadMe.md) * MAT_HYSTERETIC_BEAM - [ReadMe](https://gitlab.arup.com/kevin.stanton/AutomatedCardGenerator_LS-DYNA/blob/master/autodyna/ReadMe_hysBeams.md)* MAT_ELASTIC - [ReadMe](https://gitlab.arup.com/kevin.stanton/AutomatedCardGenerator_LS-DYNA/blob/master/autodyna/ReadMe_elasticBeams.md)
